AI Description: Java is a widely-used programming language and computing platform that is designed to be fast, secure, and reliable. It is commonly used for building mobile applications, web applications, enterprise applications, and more.
Core Features: Java is platform-independent, object-oriented, and has a large standard library. It supports multithreading, garbage collection, and exception handling. Java applications are typically compiled to bytecode that can run on any Java virtual machine (JVM).
